summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center memorandum dated August 12, 2019, reporting information passed from the Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019. It notes that inmate Reyes was going to WAB and might not return, and that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

persons.name: Reyes
persons.context: Inmate at Metropolitan Correctional Center, referenced as going to WAB and possibly not returning.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Inmate at Metropolitan Correctional Center, referenced as needing a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

events.title: Information Passed from Special Housing Unit
events.description: Information was passed from the Special Housing Unit to oncoming staff regarding inmate Reyes going to WAB and possibly not returning, and inmate Epstein needing a cellmate after his attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is a Metropolitan Correctional Center memorandum dated August 12, 2019.
It reports information from August 9, 2019, that inmate Reyes was going to WAB and might not return.
It also reports that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.
The document originates from the Special Housing Unit and was passed to oncoming staff.
The document is dated two days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
